mapper.select: SELECT cal_no , cal_ttl , cal_cn , cal_bgng_dt , cal_end_dt , cal_color , STUDY_NO FROM STUDYCALENDAR WHERE STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}
mapper.insert: insert into studygroup (study_no, std_no, study_name, study_regdate, study_cpcy, study_intro) values(seq_study_no.nextval , #{stdNo}, #{studyName}, sysdate , #{studyCpcy}, #{studyIntro})
insert into joinstatus( join_no, study_no, std_no, join_regdate, join_reason ) values(seq_joinstatus.nextval, #{studyNo}, #{stdNo}, sysdate, #{joinReason})
mapper.select: select a.join_no, a.study_no, a.std_no, b.std_nm, a.aprv_stts_cd, c.com_cd_nm, d.dept_nm, a.join_regdate, a.join_reason from joinstatus a join student b on a.std_no = b.std_no join com_code c on a.aprv_stts_cd = c.com_cd join department d on b.dept_cd = d.dept_cd where study_no = #{studyNo} and aprv_stts_cd ='wait'

select a.study_no, a.std_no, b.std_nm, a.aprv_stts_cd, c.com_cd_nm, d.dept_nm, a.join_regdate, a.join_reason from joinstatus a join student b on a.std_no = b.std_no join com_code c on a.aprv_stts_cd = c.com_cd join department d on b.dept_cd = d.dept_cd where a.study_no = #{studyNo} and a.std_no = #{stdNo}

select a.study_no, a.std_no, a.study_role, b.std_no, c.std_nm, b.study_no, b.study_name, b.study_regdate, b.study_cpcy, b.study_intro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studymember WHERE study_no= a.study_no) as count from studymember a join studygroup b on a.study_no = b.study_no join student c on b.std_no = c.std_no where a.std_no = #{stdNo} order by a.study_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM studymember WHERE study_no= #{studyNo}

select a.join_no, a.study_no, a.std_no, a.aprv_stts_cd, a.join_regdate, a.join_reason, b.study_no, b.std_no, c.std_nm, b.study_name, b.study_regdate, b.study_cpcy, b.study_intro from joinstatus a join studygroup b on a.study_no = b.study_no join student c on b.std_no = c.std_no where a.std_no = #{stdNo} and a.aprv_stts_cd = 'wait'
select b.std_no, study_no, b.std_nm, study_role, b.dept_cd, d.dept_nm from studymember a join student b on b.std_no = a.std_no join department d on d.dept_cd = b.dept_cd where study_no = #{studyNo}
select a.study_no, a.std_no, b.std_nm, a.study_name, a.study_regdate, a.study_cpcy, a.study_intro from studygroup a join student b on a.std_no = b.std_no where a.study_no = #{studyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from studymember where study_no = #{studyNo} and std_no = #{stdNo}
mapper.select: select a.lecap_no, b.lecap_yr, c.lecsc_day, c.period_cd, c.lecsc_hour from course_regist a join lecture_aply b on a.lecap_no = b.lecap_no join lecture_schedule c on a.lecap_no = c.lecap_no where a.std_no = #{stdNo} and b.lecap_yr = #{lecapYr}

select a.stbo_no, a.study_no, b.study_name, a.stbo_title, a.stbo_content, a.stbo_writer, a.stbo_regdate, a.stbo_read_cnt from studyboard a join studygroup b on a.study_no = b.study_no order by a.stbo_no desc
select stbo_no, study_no, stbo_title, stbo_content, stbo_writer, stbo_regdate, stbo_read_cnt from studyboard where stbo_no = #{stboNo}
select a.study_no, a.std_no, b.std_nm, a.study_name, a.study_regdate, a.study_cpcy, a.study_intro, a.atch_file_no from studygroup a join student b on a.std_no = b.std_no where a.std_no = #{stdNo}
mapper.insert: insert into studyboard(stbo_no, study_no, stbo_title, stbo_content, stbo_writer, stbo_regdate) values(seq_studyboard.nextval, #{studyNo}, #{stboTitle}, #{stboContent}, #{stboWriter}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update studyboard set stbo_read_cnt = stbo_read_cnt +1 where stbo_no = #{stboNo}
mapper.select: select study_no, count(*) as count from studymember group by study_no
